member.name: IFolderFilterSite.SetFilter
member.summary: Exposed by a host to allow clients to pass the host their interface pointers.
member.param: A pointer to the client's interface. To notify the host to terminate filtering and stop calling your interface, set this parameter to NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFolderFilterSite
member.summary: Exported by a host to allow clients to specify how to filter a Shell folder enumeration.
